title: Cant launch the game!
body:
Hello, ive been trying to play 2 games and the same thing happened twice. I got in champ select then when the game should start it bugs and i dont get to laoding screen. i got the "failed to connect" window with the message "unable to connect to server..."
how can i fix it ??
I just got marked as a leaver for 2 games and now i lost lp and im on low priority queue ... any help please ?
PS : I tried to launch a game with practic tool and i got the same bug

replies.body:
That error message sounds like your network wasn't able to get a very solid connection with the game server you were going to be playing on. It can happen sometimes with specific servers, but we should be able to get that ironed out by updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Also, nice choice by testing this in the new practice tool, that way you won't be getting any more penalties while we troubleshoot this!
